table.name: vtiger_bhsproduct
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhsproduct` ( `bhsproductid` int(19) NOT NULL, `bhsproduct_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhsproductid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_bhsproductcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhsproductcf` ( `bhsproductid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhsproductid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
